title: Manoa Falls
seo_description: Located nearby in the lush Manoa Valley, Manoa Falls trail is a popular hike for both families and avid hikers.
contents_1: Located nearby in the lush Manoa Valley, Manoa Falls trail is a popular hike for both families and avid hikers.
description: Located nearby in the lush Manoa Valley, Manoa Falls trail is a popular hike for both families and avid hikers. it’s also an adventurous way to explore the Hawaiian rainforest and enjoy views of the 150ft waterfall in a tropical setting.
